         <form action="/index.php" class="navbar-form" method="post">
          <label class="element-invisible" for="searchword">
           Search ...
          </label>
          <input class="inputbox mod-search_searchword" id="searchword" maxlength="200" name="searchword" onblur="if (this.value=='') this.value='Search ...';" onfocus="if (this.value=='Search ...') this.value='';" size="5" type="text" value="Search ..."/>
          0
          <input name="task" type="hidden" value="search"/>
          <input name="option" type="hidden" value="com_search"/>
          <input name="Itemid" type="hidden" value="101"/>
         </form>
        </div>
        <script type="text/javascript">
         jQuery(function($){
		$('.phone > .moduleTitle').click(function(){
			$('.phone > div.mod-search').stop().fadeToggle();
			$('.search-block').toggleClass('active')
			if($('.search-block').hasClass('active')){
				$('.phone > div.mod-search input#searchword').focus();
			}
			})
	})
        </script>
       </div>

         <script type="text/javascript">
          // initialise plugins
	jQuery(function(){
		jQuery('ul.sf-menu')
			 
		.superfish({
			hoverClass:    'sfHover',         
	    pathClass:     'overideThisToUse',
	    pathLevels:    1,    
	    delay:         500, 
	    animation:     {opacity:'show', height:'show'}, 
	    speed:         'normal',   
	    speedOut:      'fast',   
	    autoArrows:    false, 
	    disableHI:     false, 
	    useClick:      0,
	    easing:        "linear",
	    onInit:        function(){},
	    onBeforeShow:  function(){},
	    onShow:        function(){},
	    onHide:        function(){},
	    onIdle:        function(){}
		});
	});

	jQuery(function(){
		jQuery('.sf-menu').mobileMenu({
			defaultText: 'Navigate to...',
			className: 'select-menu',
			subMenuClass: 'sub-menu'
		});
	})

	jQuery(function(){
		var ismobile = navigator.userAgent.match(/(iPhone)|(iPod)|(android)|(webOS)/i)
		if(ismobile){
			jQuery('.sf-menu').sftouchscreen({});
		}
	})
         </script>

          <script type="text/javascript">
           if (typeof jQuery != 'undefined') { 
	(function($) { 
		$(document).ready(function(){
			$('.carousel').each(function(index, element) {
			$(this)[index].slide = null;
			});
		});
	})(jQuery);
}

 jQuery(document).ready(function(){
			jQuery('#iceslideshow198').carousel(

						{ interval: 5000, pause:"hover" }
			
						
						
			
			);
		  });

         </div>
         <!-- Content-bottom -->
        </div>
        <!-- Right sidebar -->
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <!-- Feature -->
    <div id="feature-row">
     <div class="row-container">
      <div class="container">
       <div class="row">
        <div class="moduletable feature_carousel span12">
         <div class="mod_caroufredsel mod_caroufredsel__feature_carousel">
          <div class="list_carousel" id="list_carousel_carousel1">
           <ul id="caroufredsel_carousel1">
            <li class="item">
             <div class="item_content">
              <!-- Intro Image -->
              <div id="sidebar1">
               <h3>
                Resources
               </h3>
               <p>
                <span style="text-decoration: underline;">

                   Daily Interbank
                  </span>

                   FX Rates

                  </a>

           </div>
           <div class="clearfix">
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="caroufredsel_prev" id="carousel_carousel1_prev">
           <i class="icon-angle-left">
           </i>
          </div>
          <div class="caroufredsel_next" id="carousel_carousel1_next">
           <i class="icon-angle-right">
           </i>
          </div>
         </div>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          if (jQuery.browser.msie &&jQuery.browser.version<9) {
	jQuery(document).ready(function() {

		var carouselConteiner = jQuery("#caroufredsel_carousel1");

		carouselConteiner.carouFredSel({
			responsive	: true,
			width: '100%',
			items		: {
				width : 252,
				height: 'variable',
				visible		: {
					min			: 1,
					max			: 4				},
				minimum: 1
			},
			scroll: {
				items: 1,
				fx: "scroll",
				easing: "swing",
				duration: 500,
				queue: true
			},
			auto: false,
							next: "#carousel_carousel1_next",
				prev: "#carousel_carousel1_prev",
										pagination: "#carousel_carousel1_pag",
						swipe:{
				onTouch: true
			}
		});
	});
} else {
	jQuery(window).load(function() {

		var carouselConteiner = jQuery("#caroufredsel_carousel1");

		carouselConteiner.carouFredSel({
			responsive	: true,
			width: '100%',
			items		: {
				width : 252,
				height: 'variable',
				visible		: {
					min			: 1,
					max			: 4				},
				minimum: 1
			},
			scroll: {
				items: 1,
				fx: "scroll",
				easing: "swing",
				duration: 500,
				queue: true
			},
			auto: false,
							next: "#carousel_carousel1_next",
				prev: "#carousel_carousel1_prev",
										pagination: "#carousel_carousel1_pag",
						swipe:{
				onTouch: true
			}
		});
	});
}
         </script>
        </div>
       </div>

   </button>
   <div class="modal-header">
    <h3 class="">
     Login Form
    </h3>
   </div>
   <div class="modal-body">
    <div class="mod-login mod-login__">
     <form action="/index.php" class="" method="post">
      <div class="mod-login_userdata">
       <label class="" for="mod-login_username">
        Username
       </label>
       <input class="inputbox mod-login_username" id="mod-login_username" name="username" placeholder="Username" size="18" tabindex="1" type="text"/>
       <label class="" for="mod-login_passwd">
        Password
       </label>
       <input class="inputbox mod-login_passwd" id="mod-login_passwd" name="password" placeholder="Password" size="18" tabindex="2" type="password"/>
       <label class="checkbox" for="mod-login_remember">
        Remember Me
        <input class="mod-login_remember" id="mod-login_remember" name="remember" type="checkbox" value="yes"/>
       </label>
       <div class="mod-login_submit">
        <button class="btn btn-primary" name="Submit" tabindex="3" type="submit">
         Log in
        </button>
       </div>
       <ul class="unstyled">
        <li>
         <a class="" href="/index.php/username-reminder-request" title="Forgot your username?">
          Forgot your username?
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a class="" href="/index.php/password-reset" title="Forgot your password?">
          Forgot your password?
         </a>
        </li>
       </ul>
